name: card.01
title: Intelligent Rodents
rules1: When you rant, draw 2 extra cards, and then discard 2 cards from those you drew.
rules2: Before you graverob, you may add the top card of the deck to the graveyard.

name: card.02
title: Brain in a Jar
rules1: +1 max handsize.
rules2: You may draw after playing a wild role.

name: card.03
title: Glowy green things
rules1: Your metal gadgets (finished and unfinished) are worth +1 infamy each.
rules2: You may add chemical material to any gadget you are building as long as it completes the gadget.

name: card.04
title: Humanoid Cat
rules1: You may also hypnotize 1 card from your hand when hypnotizing.
rules2: When you finish this, you may immediately Hypnotize 1 time.

name: card.05
title: Vampire-Pepper
rules1: Your finished gadgets may horde +1 token each.
rules2: You may also use 1 material from your hand when graverobbing.

name: card.06
title: Concotion of Happiness
rules1: When you complete this, convert a completed gadget into a minion (discarding tokens and cards tucked under it).
rules2: Whenever you are tortured: draw a card.

name: card.07
title: Helper-bot
rules1: Whenever you are tortured: draw a card and then add a token to 1 of your gadgets.
rules2: When you Recycle, add 1 additional token to any card you add a token to.

name: card.08
title: Gravity Engine
rules1: All your minions count as Craftsmen when following. you may build this with any type of material.
rules2: +3 infamy. you may build this with any type of material.

name: card.09
title: Temporal Clacker
rules1: Your unfinished metal gadgets still provide you with infamy.
rules2: When you finish this, you may immediately Craft any number of times.

name: card.10
title: Nefarious Turbine
rules1: You may hypnotize 1 extra minion when you hypnotize. You may also hypnotize minions from the your hand when hypnotizing.
rules2: Whenever you add a material to an unfinished gadget, finish it.

name: card.11
title: Birdbath
rules1: Before you craft, draw a card. you may discard an extra card to add an extra token to a gadget during the craft.
rules2: -1 infamy. At the start of your turn, you may draw 2 cards.

name: card.12
title: Personificationizer
rules1: When you Torture you may convert a completed gadget into a minion (discarding tokens and cards tucked under the gadget).
rules2: When you Recycle you may convert a minion into a completed gadget (tokens on the minion remain on the gadget).

name: card.13
title: Antimemetic Weapon
rules1: You may discard any number of cards before ranting.
rules2: When you finish this, swap it with a card in your hand.

name: card.14
title: Abstract Device
rules1: When you tinker, discard a card from the graveyard to add tokens equal to the card's infamy to a finished gadget.
rules2: At the end of your turn if the top card of the deck's infamy matches the number of cards in your hand, hypnotize it.

name: card.15
title: Ionization Engine
rules1: You may rant after any turn during which you tinkered or hypnotized.
rules2: When you gain a minion, you may take 2 cards matching that minion's type from the graveyard.

name: card.16
title: Baghdad Capacitor
rules1: You may also add 1 material from the graveyard to a gadget you are building each time you craft.
rules2: When you finish this, discard all electrical cards from your hand and the graveyard, adding 2 tokens to this for each.

name: card.17
title: Hypno-crown
rules1: After you are tortured, you may hypnotize a minion from your hand.
rules2: When you rant you may discard this to convert 1 + the number of tokens on this cards from the graveyard into minions.

name: card.18
title: Carapace Fertilizer
rules1: When this leaves play, its owner may add 1 token to each of their gadgets (complete and incomplete).
rules2: Before you torture, you may move any tokens that you have on any of your minions to your Torturer minion.

name: card.19
title: Seven Minute Boots
rules1: At the end of each of your turns, you may Rant.
rules2: Your Craftsman and Tinkerer minions may perform their actions 3 times each when you lead or follow their role.

name: card.20
title: AutoCrammer
rules1: Your Hypnotist minions count as every role.
rules2: After you Rant, you may draw up to 4 additional cards. If you do, discard this.

name: card.21
title: Death Ray
rules1: You may discard a minion to the graveyard to perform its action 2 additional times when it is performing its action.
rules2: You may end the game at the start of any of your turns. Score as usual.

name: card.22
title: Kinetic Accumulator
rules1: When the game ends, score your minions and the tokens on them twice.
rules2: Your gadgets require 1 fewer materials to finish.

name: card.23
title: Chronometric Coupler
rules1: After you finish this, tuck every card in your hand under gadgets you own face down (if legal).
rules2: When you follow, you may return cards from the graveyard of the same role to perform the same action that many times.

name: card.24
title: the Iron Midas
rules1: When you rant you may convert any number of minions into completed gadgets (tokens remain on the new gadgets).
rules2: When building you may treat any material as metal.

name: card.25
title: Dr. Doom Device
rules1: If you have 4 gadgets of the same type of material at any time, you win.
rules2: If you start your turn with 1 minion of each role, you win.

name: card.26
title: Spatial Anomalizer
rules1: Your opponents may not rant during your turn.
rules2: At the end of the game, select a material. You may count any of the cards in your hand as that material for scoring purposes.

name: card.27
title: Zombie Cannon
rules1: When you torture, you may also discard a card from the graveyard (to add an additional token to 1 of your gadgets).
rules2: When you finish this, exchange a tucked card for a gadget of the same total infamy.

name: card.28
title: Collapsing Gun
rules1: +1 infamy. When you hypnotize, you may Hypnotize your opponent's minions if they have more minions than you.
rules2: When you torture, you may also discard a card from your hand (to add an additional token to 1 of your gadgets).

name: card.29
title: Trenchcoat Generator
rules1: When your opponent plays a wild role, you may rant.
rules2: You are immune to torture.

name: card.30
title: Bone Teleportation Network
rules1: After you finish this, discard each card in the graveyard to add tokens equal to its infamy to your finished gadgets.
rules2: After you torture, steal up to 3 tokens from an opponent who has more tokens than you adding them to your finished gadgets.

name: card.31
title: Biggerizer
rules1: When you finish this, add a token to every card in play.
rules2: Your hand size increases by the number of tokens you have on your Recycler minion.

name: card.32
title: Volcanic Probe
rules1: When you Hypnotize, add a token to a minion.
rules2: After you Tinker, draw a card and add a token to a card in the graveyard.

name: card.33
title: Revivification Matrix
rules1: When you finish this, draw a card per minion you have, and add a token to every card in the graveyard.
rules2: When you finish this, you may swap it with a card in the graveyard.

name: card.34
title: Tissue Disruptor
rules1: After you Craft using metal, draw a card and add a token to a card in the graveyard.
rules2: After you Tinker, you may rotate 1 of your completed gadgets.

name: card.35
title: Etheric Compass
rules1: Your Tinkerer minion may add tokens to your Recycler minion instead of a completed gadget.
rules2: After you Recycle, add a token to a card in the graveyard and you may then discard a card to Rant.

name: card.36
title: Pollution Amplifier
rules1: When you Hypnotize, add a token to a gadget you own.
rules2: After you Recycle, you may discard a card to reallocate all tokens on your minions.
